Course Class

class classes.Course.Course(course_id: str, course_name: str, instructor_id: str, enrolled_students: list)[source]

Bases: object

assign_instructor(instructor: Instructor)[source]

Assigns an instructor to the course.

Parameters:

instructor (Instructor) – The instructor to assign.

Returns:

A tuple containing:

  • bool: True if the instructor was assigned, False if already assigned.

  • list: A list of messages indicating success or errors encountered.

Return type:

tuple

  • list: A list of messages indicating success or errors encountered.

validate()[source]

Validates the course details.

Checks if the course ID is 5 characters long and the course name is 7 characters long.

Returns:

A tuple containing:

  • bool: True if validation passed, False otherwise.

  • list: A list of messages indicating success or errors encountered.

Return type:

tuple

introduce()[source]

Provides a self-introduction string.

Returns:

A string introducing the person with their name and age.

Return type:

str

validate()[source]

Validates the person’s details, ensuring that the age is above 17, the name is not too short, and the email is in a valid format.

Returns:

A tuple containing:

  • bool: True if validation passed, False otherwise.

  • list: A list of messages indicating success or errors encountered.

Return type:

tuple

Parameters:

course (Course) – An instance of the Course class to unassign the instructor from.

Registers the student to a course if they are not already registered.
